Headline: #20 Madison Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Madison/Austin-Mason
ShortDescription: Eastbound 20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted via Madsion, Austin, Washington and Central due to street blockage near Madison/Austin-Mason.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Eastbound #20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted via Madsion, Austin, Washington and Central due to street blockage near Madison/Austin-Mason.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
